scenes.description: Mori Calliope performing the song 'Mizutamarida' (Puddle) on a neon-lit stage with skeletons.
Mori Calliope speaks to the audience and transitions to the next song, 'SAKURA Days'.
Mori Calliope performing a cover of 'SAKURA Days'.

subtitles.original: ...だけが 気があった
subtitles.english: ...Only that, I noticed

subtitles.original: 生きていくこと それは立ち向かっていくこと
subtitles.english: Living is about facing forward

subtitles.original: それがわかったなら
subtitles.english: Once you understand that,

subtitles.original: あとは踏み出す勇気だけ
subtitles.english: all that's left is the courage to take a step

subtitles.original: どこまでもゆくよ ここで知ったこと
subtitles.english: I'll go anywhere, with what I've learned here

subtitles.original: 幸せという夢をかなえてみせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll show you that I can make the dream of happiness come true

subtitles.original: みんなと離れても どんなに遠くなっても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm separated from everyone, no matter how far away I get

subtitles.original: 新しい明日に この僕は生きるよ
subtitles.english: In the new tomorrow, I will live

subtitles.original: 一人でもゆくよ 死にたくなっても
subtitles.english: I'll go even alone, even if I feel like dying

subtitles.original: 声が聞こえるよ 死んではいけないと
subtitles.english: I can hear a voice saying I must not die

subtitles.original: たとえ辛くても 闇に閉ざされても
subtitles.english: Even if it's painful, even if I'm shut in the darkness

subtitles.original: 心の奥には 灯りがともってるよ
subtitles.english: In the depths of my heart, a light is burning

subtitles.original: 巡って流れて 時は移ろい
subtitles.english: Circling and flowing, time changes

subtitles.original: もう何があったか 思い出せないけど
subtitles.english: I can't remember what happened anymore, but...

subtitles.original: 目を閉じてみれば みんなの笑い声
subtitles.english: If I close my eyes, I hear everyone's laughter

subtitles.original: なぜかそれが今 一番の宝物
subtitles.english: For some reason, that is my greatest treasure now

subtitles.original: Now, I'll sing one more song.
subtitles.english: Now, I'll sing one more song.

subtitles.original: 離れる頃 桜散る 全てが愛おしい
subtitles.english: When we part, cherry blossoms fall, everything is precious

subtitles.original: セピアの心情を 開いては また想い耽る
subtitles.english: Opening up my sepia emotions, I lose myself in thought again

subtitles.original: SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: 賑わいと 温もりを
subtitles.english: They brought bustle and warmth

subtitles.original: 運んでくれた
subtitles.english: they carried me through

subtitles.original: おかげで 色づいた花
subtitles.english: Thanks to that, the flowers bloomed with color

subtitles.original: ある者は焦がれて
subtitles.english: Some long for it,

subtitles.original: ある者は皆で分かち合い
subtitles.english: some share it with everyone

subtitles.original: 羨望の眼差しを 向ける者も
subtitles.english: Some even cast looks of envy

subtitles.original: 舞い散る夜風に 秘めた切な愛おしい
subtitles.english: In the dancing night breeze, a hidden painful endearment

subtitles.original: サヨナラとありがとう 共に贈るよ
subtitles.english: I send both my goodbyes and my thanks

subtitles.original: おかげで また好きになった
subtitles.english: Thanks to you, I've come to like it again

subtitles.original: 去る者を追えるはずなく
subtitles.english: No way to chase those who leave,

subtitles.original: 来る者は拒めるわけない
subtitles.english: no way to refuse those who come

subtitles.original: 故に尊い 桜色の 日々よ
subtitles.english: Thus, the precious cherry-blossom-colored days

subtitles.original: 離れる頃 桜...
subtitles.english: When we part, cherry...
